line.originaltext: 1 1/4 cups all-purpose flour
1/2 cup unsweetened cocoa powder
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/4 cup sliced almonds
1/4 cup butter, softened
2/3 cup white sugar
1 egg, beaten
1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Turn a 9x5 inch loaf pan or metal bowl upside down and cover the outside with foil.
line.annotation: create_tool(t1, "9x5 inch loaf pan or metal bowl")

line.originaltext: Turn a 9x5 inch loaf pan or metal bowl upside down and cover the outside with foil.
line.annotation: set(t1,"turn upside down and cover the outside with foil")

line.originaltext: Place onto a cookie sheet.
Place onto a cookie sheet.
Stir together the flour, cocoa, salt and almonds; set aside.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2, ing3}, ing8, "nut mix", "stir together")

line.originaltext: In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth.
In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth.
In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth.
line.annotation: mix(ing9, t3, ing10, "creamed butter", "cream together until smooth")

line.originaltext: Beat in the egg and vanilla.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing6, ing7}, ing11, "egg vanilla mix", "beat in")

line.originaltext: Gradually stir in the dry ingredients to form a fairly stiff dough.
Gradually stir in the dry ingredients to form a fairly stiff dough.
On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch in thickness.
Cut into circles using a glass or cookie cutter.
On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch in thickness.
line.annotation: do(ing12, t4, ing13, "rolled dough", "roll out dough to 1/4 inch in thickness")

line.originaltext: Cut into circles using a glass or cookie cutter.
Starting at the top (bottom) of the pan or bowl, arrange cookies so they are overlapping.
line.annotation: do(ing14, t1, ing15, "partially covered pan", "start at the top of the pan, arranging cookies so they are overlapping")

line.originaltext: Work toward the edges covering as much of the pan as you can.
line.annotation: do(ing15, t1, ing16, "covered pan", "work toward the edges, covering the pan")

line.originaltext: Be sure to press each cookie on so you will have a good solid bowl.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing16,"press each cookie to make bowl solid")

line.originaltext: Bake for 10 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until cookies are firm.
line.annotation: cook(ing16, t0, ing17, "baked bowl", "bake for 10 to 15 minutes")

line.originaltext: Bake for 10 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until cookies are firm.
Cool completely.
Carefully turn the pan over and remove the pan from the foil, then carefully remove the foil from inside the cookie structure.
line.annotation: do(ing17, t1, ing18, "cookie bowl", "carefully turn the pan over and remove the pan from the foil, then carefully remove the foil from inside the cookie structure")

line.originaltext: Fill with cookie or candy.
